p: We found that epidemic waves from Rio de Janeiro state and the north-eastern region displayed a synchronicity during the period from late 2015 to early months of 2016 ( Fig 3), and there is a high human mobility between the two regions [ 28]. From combined epidemiological and genetic data, we found that the northeast Brazil is the most likely source location of the ECSA-lineage strain that was circulating unnoticed during the 2016 epidemic in the state of Rio de Janeiro.
